ActNational Energy Board Act
PrecisApproval for the issuance by the National Energy Board of Amending order AO-2-GC-110 to amend the Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity GC-110 which authorized EMERA BRUNSWICK PIPELINE COMPANY LTD. to widen the general corridor that was approved in the Reasons for Decision for the Brunswick Pipeline Project to accommodate the proposed re-route with respect to a section of the detailed route that the National Energy Board rejected during the Detailed Route hearing.
